DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study investigate outcome congenital cataract surgery inject intraoperative intracameral triamcinolone versus postoperative use oral prednisolone . This prospective , randomized clinical trial . Sixty child submit congenital cataract surgery young 2 year age . They randomly divide two group . The study group receive intraoperative intracameral triamcinolone acetonide injection . The control group receive prednisolone syrup postoperatively . The surgical outcome assess one year .
